data.name: Commitment
data.opcodes: 4 ROLL JUMPIF:$cancel $spend 5 ROLL SHA256 3 ROLL EQUALVERIFY 3 ROLL ROT TXSIGHASH SWAP CHECKSIG JUMP:$_end $cancel 3 ROLL BLOCKHEIGHT LESSTHAN VERIFY 3 ROLL SWAP TXSIGHASH SWAP CHECKSIG $_end
data.source: contract Commitment(  publicKey1: PublicKey,  publicKey2: PublicKey,  revocation1: Hash,  blockHeight: Integer) locks valueAmount of valueAsset {  clause spend(preimage1: String, sig2: Signature) {    verify sha256(preimage1) == revocation1    verify checkTxSig(publicKey2, sig2)    unlock valueAmount of valueAsset  }  clause cancel(sig1: Signature) {    verify above(blockHeight)    verify checkTxSig(publicKey1, sig1)    unlock valueAmount of valueAsset  }}
